fire

  • fire(event: string, value: any, forget?: boolean): void
    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/Events.ts:42

    Fires an event.

    Notifies existing subscribers to the event, optionally retains the event to give to any subsequent notifications on the event as they are made.

    Parameters

    • event: string

      The event name

    • value: any

      The event parameters

    • Optional forget: boolean

      When true, does not retain event for subsequent subscribers

    Returns void

hasSubs

  • hasSubs(event: string): boolean
    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/Events.ts:163

    Returns true if there are any subscribers to the given event on this Events.

    Parameters

    • event: string

      The event name

    Returns boolean

    True if there are any subscribers to the given event

off

  • off(subId: number): void
    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/Events.ts:119

    Cancels an event subscription that was previously made with Events.on or Events.once.

    Parameters

    • subId: number

      Subscription ID

    Returns void

on

  • on(event: string, callback: (a: any) => void): number
    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/Events.ts:78

    Subscribes to an event.

    Parameters

    • event: string

      The event name

    • callback: (a: any) => void

      Callback to handle the event

        • (a: any): void

        • Parameters

          • a: any

          Returns void

    Returns number

    Handle to the subscription, which may be used to unsubscribe with Events.off.

once

  • once(event: string, callback: (a: any) => void): void
    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/Events.ts:149

    Subscribes to the next occurrence of the given event, then un-subscribes as soon as the event is handled.

    This is equivalent to calling Events.on, and then calling Events.off inside the callback function.

    Parameters

    • event: string

      The event name

    • callback: (a: any) => void

      Callback to handle the event

        • (a: any): void

        • Parameters

          • a: any

          Returns void

    Returns void
